name: Record a vaccine with nhs number [2-9450141711-BECCLES HOUSE-Home Of Housebound Patient-yes-today-2-yes-yes-today-1-KRISTIA SIDAWAY-24/6/1992-41 BALTIMORE ROAD, LYTHAM ST. ANNES, LANCS, FY8 3NY-Flu-Influvac sub-unit Tetra (QIVe surface antigen) - Viatri-SDYY2-22A-19/10/2026]

steps.name: Given I login to RAVS and set vaccinator details with BECCLES HOUSE and Home Of Housebound Patient and get patient details for 9450141711 with option 2 and choose to vaccinate with vaccine details as Flu, Influvac sub-unit Tetra (QIVe surface antigen) - Viatri, SDYY2-22A with 19/10/2026
And I search for a patient with the NHS number in the find a patient screen
And I open the patient record by clicking on patient KRISTIA SIDAWAY
When I click choose vaccine button and choose the Flu, Influvac sub-unit Tetra (QIVe surface antigen) - Viatri, SDYY2-22A with 19/10/2026 and click continue
And I assess the patient's yes with the details and date as today-2 and click continue to record consent screen button
And I record yes with the details and click continue to vaccinate button
And I record yes details and date as today-1 and click Continue to Check and confirm screen
Then I need to be able to see the patient KRISTIA SIDAWAY, 24/6/1992, 41 BALTIMORE ROAD, LYTHAM ST. ANNES, LANCS, FY8 3NY and vaccination details on the check and confirm screen
